reviews.title: Don't Stay here!
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel this past September (22-24). We were very suprised to find that the front door was not being used due to construction. We were sent in via a side fire exit door. The reception dest was a bunch of card tables with a sheet over them. The constuction was very noisy and bothersome. The bell - hop said it would be going on for another year! Not only that, but the room was extremely small, the carpets were disgusting and the bathroom was not clean according to my standards! I would strongly recommend not staying here, there are too many other hotels in Florence! The only good points were the location, and the service!

reviews.title: Horrible Hotel
reviews.text: Horrible, Stained carpets, stained bedspread, cigarette butts on terrace with apt clothesline overhead. Lobby being renovated when we arrived.
Listed as a 4 star hotel. should be listed as a minus 4 star! Cigarette smell in room even after asking for non smoking!
reviews.title: Highly Recommended!

reviews.text: The Executive is located on a great little corner near the river. The room had a nice wood floor and a beautiful bathroom. Everything was clean and crisp and very stately. We had a great breakfast every morning. Would recommend this to my friends and family.
reviews.title: Clean and Crisp Hotel!
Clean, spacious rooms
reviews.text: This is a nice 4-star hotel. Our room was spacious and clean, and breakfast was decent. However, I must admit that we only spent one night there.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thought after all the "raving reviews" on this website that this place would be a great getaway for a night, but this place is a ripp-off and should not be considered for a stay in Florence
reviews.title: Do not go there!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Room was old with mildow above the window, dirty carpet; so small, that you could not even turn around in it!
reviews.title: Great Location and Service!
First Rate experience
reviews.text: - Only "double beds" available, no king size...

We stayed in at least 4 star hotels in Rome and Venice as well, and this was the best hotel of the three. It's a 15 min walk to the uffizi gallery, and dont think that's far b/c along the way there's so much to see. Very nice concierge, breakfast was included and just OK. The room was big, marble floor bathroom, bigger shower than other European hotels, even had toothbrushes ready for us in our room. Very comfortable bed, unlike others in Italy. Would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: Dont let other reviews put you off this hotel. We booked through totalstay.com for 4 nights from 29/12 to 2/1 and paid £30 per person for bed and breakfast.
reviews.title: New Year Value
The hotel was quite basic and just borders onto being a 4 star hotel
reviews.text: So the rooms are not the most luxurious - they were clean and tidy with decent bathrooms. The breakfast was excellent - plenty of it always fresh.

reviews.title: 4 star hotel convenient for station
reviews.text: The interior of the hotel is lovely - we were grateful as it was raining so hard you could not go outside! The reception staff were pleasant and very welcoming when we arrived.

reviews.title: Wonderful hotel!
reviews.text: In summary, if you want a inexpensive hotel within walking distance of eberywhere in Florence, this is the hotel.
